programme.title: Bill Gates and the Senate Judiciary Committee
programme.short_synopsis: Bill Gates appears before the Senate Judiciary Committee in a monopoly investigation.
programme.medium_synopsis: Bill Gates comes before the Senate Judiciary Committee accused of creating an internet browser monopoly and Alistair Cooke considers previous appearances from Rockefeller to Nixon.
